room_title: Escape room "Bugsy's Nightmare" by Xterious Escape in Las Vegas
review: My first experience and we had a party of seven.  What fun and can't wait for the next experience.

room_title: Escape room "Bugsy's Nightmare" by Xterious Escape in Las Vegas
review: I brought my husband here for a surprise birthday outing. We had a great time! 'Bugsy's Nightmare' was challenging but great fun. We can't wait to bring some friends and try another room. The staff was amazing and very attentive. We hope to one day make it on the leaderboard.

room_title: Escape room "Bugsy's Nightmare" by Xterious Escape in Las Vegas
review: Went here with a group of 4 others for our first escape room experience. We played Bugsy's Nightmare and had a blast! Cant wait to go back.
